## OmvFeatureFilterDescriptionBuilder.OmvFeatureFilterDescriptionBuilderOptions.processPolygonsDefault property

If `true`<!-- -->, all unspecified polygon features will be processed. If `false`<!-- -->, all unspecified polygon features will be ignored.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
processPolygonsDefault?: boolean;
```
